jd:
Need AEM Developer
Location: San Jose, CA or Tracy, CA (4 days onsite)
Duration: 12+ Month Contract
Note: need local folks only.
Responsibilities
• Build, implement system and application design to achieve defined digital experience and business needs using AEM. 
• Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle including support/sustenance of web-based applications/properties. 
• Work in agile, rapid development, and prototyping environments.
• Must Have production support Exp. 7+ years of experience in architecting and developing websites/applications using AEM Sites, Assets, Java & Web Marketing functions with expertise in related technologies.
• AEM backend development skills with Sling Servlets, Java libraries, OSGi Components, etc. 
• Technical support skills with strong troubleshooting experience are preferred.
• Support all production issues and work with other teams/vendors to resolve the issues.
